title: Branch change CGPA
content: What is the cgpa required for changing branch to cse and aiml . Also campus change cg also to cse rr or aiml rr from ec ece.

comments.body: During my time, which was admittedly a long time ago, it was around 9.6 and above. Depends on the department, civil and mechanical has slightly lower, ECE had higher.

Rr cse- 9.68
Rr aiml- 8.2
Ec cse- 7.4
Rest are even lower and i don't remember

The allotment is purely cgpa based, you get no preference based on your current branch
